name: macpro-wms-connector
description: WMS Oracle CDC to BigMAC Kafka via Debezium and Kafka Connect

scripts.preinstall: node -e "if (process.env.npm_config_user_agent && process.env.npm_config_user_agent.startsWith('npm/')) { console.error('This project uses Yarn. Use: yarn install'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.synth: yarn build && yarn exec cdk synth
